options.name: First Impression
options.description: You know how profound a first impression can be and spend extra effort to ensure you leave a good one. Gain +1 skill with persuasion. The first social check you make against a creature gains a bonus dice.

options.name: Iron Composure
options.description: Negotiating isn't always friendly, and you have been the target of some colorful language. You gain +2 maximum resolve and +2 psychic mitigation.

options.name: Divine Patience
options.description: Your experience with tense mediation has cause you to have an almost supernatural level of patience. Gain +1 skill with resilience. You roll a bonus dice against checks against the becoming maddened.

options.name: Reaction : Parley
options.description: In response to a creature that you share a language with taking a violent action, you attempt to force them to reconsider by making a contested persuasion check against their resilience. On a success, the target can still choose to take the action but with two penalty dice. If the creature elects to not take their action, they will immediately use it as a reaction without expending energy if anyone takes a hostile act towards them or their allies.

options.name: Cultural Knowledge
options.description: You gain +1 skill with academics. When making any knowledge check involving the rituals, ceremonies or customs involving another culture, you gain a bonus dice.

options.name: Travel Experience
options.description: You are extremely worldly, having experienced many cultures and dealt with many negotiations. Gain +4 language points. Additionally, when you spend at least a month in a settlement, you learn the local language at a basic level.

options.name: Read the Room
options.description: You can quickly assess social dynamics. Gain +1 skill with insight. When entering a new social situation, you can determine what creature, if any, is in charge or has any authority.

options.name: Action : Cutting Words
options.description: You target an enemy that you share at least one language with that you are fluent in and make a persuasion check against their insight in an attempt to influence them. You deal 4 psychic damage for each success you have. If you have 3 or more successes, you can instead choose to give the target either the confused or maddened conditions. You cannot target the same creature twice with this ability.

options.name: Action : Demand Surrender
options.description: You target a creature that you share at least one language with that you are fluent in and force them to make a resilience check against your contested persuasion check. If the target of this ability is above 5 health, the result of their resilience check is doubled. If a creature has 0 health or 0 resolve, their resilience check is halved instead.

options.name: Wordsmith
options.description: You seem to always know the right thing to say. You gain +1 skill with persuasion. When you make a persuasion check, the minimum dice value you can roll is a 6.
